title: Revolutionizing Lignin Photovalorization: Recent advances on TiO2-based materials and beyond in pursuit of optimal solutions for a sustainable future
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00299G, Review Article
Sabiha Sultana, Karolina Syrek, Grzegorz Dariusz Sulka
Lignin is an underutilized lignocellulosic component of biomass and often called waste, is a rich reservoir of fuel and aromatic chemicals. Although there has been a lot of research in...
